title: BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work-Versatile Foot Stool with Washable Cover-Comfortable Footrest with 2 Adjustable Heights for Car,Home and Office to Relieve Back,Lumbar,Knee Pain-Black
descriptions:
**Product Name:** BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work

**Description:** 

The BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work is a high-quality foam foot rest designed to provide comfort and support while sitting for long periods of time. It is suitable for use in offices, cars, homes, and airplanes, and can be positioned under your feet or behind your knees for optimal support.

**Product Details:** 

- Material: Made with high-quality foam and a durable fabric cover, ensuring long-lasting durability.
- Color: Black
- Dimensions: 
  - Lower Layer: 
    - Length: 16.9 inches
    - Width: 11.2 inches
    - Height: 2.0 inches
  - Upper Layer Thickness: 3.7 inches
- Adjustable Height: The foot rest offers adjustable height to accommodate your preferences. The height can be easily adjusted using the magic tapes and zipper mechanism.
- Non-Slip Design: The bottom of the foot rest features a non-slip design, providing stability and preventing it from sliding on different surfaces.
- Cleaning: The cover of the foot rest can be easily removed using the zipper closure and is machine washable for convenient cleaning.
- Benefits: The BlissTrends Foot Rest not only relieves discomfort but also supports correct sitting habits, promoting better posture and reducing strain on your body.

Order the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work today and experience enhanced comfort and support during your work or travel hours.

The BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work is a high-quality footrest designed to provide comfort and support while sitting for extended periods. Its black color adds a sleek and professional touch to any workspace.

Crafted with a high-quality foam core and a durable fabric cover, this footrest ensures long-lasting durability. Its non-slip design prevents it from sliding around, providing stability and peace of mind.

With adjustable height capability, this footrest can be easily customized to your desired level. The magic tapes and zipper mechanism make height adjustments effortless and secure.

Cleaning is a breeze with the BlissTrends Foot Rest. The cover can be easily removed using the zipper closure and is machine washable, allowing for hassle-free maintenance.

This footrest is versatile and can be used in various settings such as the office, car, home, or even during air travel. It can be positioned under your feet or behind your knees, providing optimal support and comfort.

Not only does the BlissTrends Foot Rest relieve discomfort associated with prolonged sitting, but it also promotes correct sitting habits. Say goodbye to back, lumbar, and knee pain with this ergonomic design.

Upgrade your workspace with the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work and experience the ultimate comfort and support for your feet and legs.
